ch.uzh.ifi.MechanismDesignPrimitives

Class AllocationEC

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.uzh.ifi.MechanismDesignPrimitives.Allocation
      • ch.uzh.ifi.MechanismDesignPrimitives.AllocationEC

  • public class AllocationEC
extends Allocation
    The class defines an allocation data structure for domains with uncertainty. Can be used by all EC- an Exp- mechanisms in the Mechanisms toolbox.
    Author:
    Dmitry Moor

      • addRealizedRVs

        public void addRealizedRVs(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> realizedRVs)
        The method used to store a list of realized availabilities of allocated bundles (but not individual goods).
        Parameters:

      • addRealizedValuesPerGood

        public void addRealizedValuesPerGood(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> realizedRVsPerGood)
        The method used to store realized availabilities of ALL goods in the auction. (NOTE: the m-m can ignore some of these realizations, e.g., if it is assumed that realized availabilities of only allocated goods are known).
        Parameters:
        realizedRVsPerGood - - realized availabilities of all goods in the auction
